column2:
Please solve the following logic puzzle in the following table: 

|        |       1    |    2    |    3     |    4    |    5    |
| transport |         |         |         |         |         |
| birthday  |         |         |         |         |         |
| city |         |         |         |         |         |
| cigar  |         |         |         |         |         |
| pet  |         |         |         |         |          

Puzzle: 
 
The people's birthday is in 5 different months: may, january, july, june, september
The people use 5 different means of transport: quad-bike, ship, van, helicopter, skateboard
5 different brands of cigars are smoked: old-gold, kools, chesterfields, lucky-strike, parliaments
City: hannover, berlin, venice, colone, hamburg
5 different pets are kept: dog, fox, zebra, horse, snails

1. the person driving the quad-bike is the person who's birthday is in may
2. the person driving the ship is the owner of the dog
3. the person traveling to hannover is the person who's birthday is in january
4. the person driving the van is the person traveling to berlin
5. the person who's birthday is in january is to the right of the person who's birthday is in july
6. the old-gold-smoker is the owner of the snails
7. the kools-smoker is the person who's birthday is in june
8. the person traveling to venice is in the middle
9. the person driving the helicopter is on the far left
10. the chesterfields-smoker is on the left or right of the owner of the fox
11. the kools-smoker is to the left or right of the owner of the horse
12. the lucky-strike-smoker is the person traveling to colone
13. the person driving the skateboard is the parliaments-smoker
14. the person driving the helicopter is to the left or right of the person who's birthday is in september. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.
